text:
from JMeter documentation :
"The current version of JMeter does not let you know when it has finished 
running your Test Plan. You have to determine this by viewing the console 
output or the File Reporter output file. "
This should be listed as an issue.
Happens with GUI and commandline-based. It's VERY annoying when JMeter is used 
in a scripted environment
creator: Geert.Poels@skynet.be

text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
